The Border Crisis shows no signs of slowing down. . .

In the month of March alone, U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) encountered the highest number of migrants recorded in more than two decades ‚Äì more than 172,000. 

https://www.wibw.com/2021/04/14/laturner-and-moran-speak-out-about-their-visits-to-us-mexico-border/

Pres. Biden‚Äôs policies paved the way for this crisis. In addition to the humanitarian and national security crisis we are witnessing, Pres. Biden‚Äôs inaction is leading to 2nd & 3rd order effects, which may impact trade and our food supply chain. Pres. Biden & VP Harris must act

Last year, we brought in more than $31 billion of agriculture goods into the US by truck and rail at these ports. It is essential the border is secured to allow the flow of goods from our neighbors to the south, and also ensures that we can safely export our own American products

When I visited the southern border last week, it was important to me to learn how the crisis at our border is impacting agricultural trade. The southern border holds several essential ports of entry to bring in agricultural products. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1383155691314151426/pu/img/sAdw0Yn1-T4Hl3zj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1383155691314151426/pu/vid/320x568/UZTFa7gMfJEg-uIa.mp4?tag=12

"And let‚Äôs not forget, the people...the people
leading the charge are my incredibly talented colleagues...the engineers, scientists,
environmentalists, truckers, rig hands and others who comprise our industry." #WhereAreTheJobs
"In Colorado, we‚Äôre actively reducing our emissions and constantly improving our technologies to make our industry better, safer and cleaner than anywhere else in the world."  #WhereAreTheJobs

"We all know you can‚Äôt turn up the sun to power solar panels or make the wind blow harder through our
turbines. Only fossil fuels like natural gas can be flexible to meet demand." #WhereAreTheJobs

"We have rural households powered by propone and
natural gas that both heat our homes and keep our food cold. On those hottest days and coldest polar vortexes, our urban residents need the ability to ramp up power to meet demand." WhereAreTheJobs

"While it may be good politics and fodder for the beltway, moving entirely away from fossil fuels is a utopian dream only capable of thriving in a place like Washington DC. In Colorado, it gets cold in the winter and hot in the summer." #WhereAreTheJobs
Chelsie Miera, the Executive Director of the West Slope Colorado Oil and Gas Association is now up. #WhereAreTheJobs
"With an indefinite leasing ban on federal lands alone, the American Petroleum Institute estimates that New Mexico will lose 62,000 jobs over the next 21-months." #WhereAreTheJobs

"54% of New Mexico‚Äôs oil comes from federal lands and mineral rights" #WhereAreTheJobs

"And lastly, the lift boats that came from Cut Off, Louisiana, to help erect those windmills did not get up there on by themselves. They were propelled with diesel engines." LaFourche Parrish President Chaisson #WhereAreTheJobs

"As the Biden Administration moves to renewable, they are asking us to pretend that oil and gas just does not exist. In reality, those lithium batteries that power their electric cars come from mines in Mexico that are powered by generators fed with natural gas" #WhereAreTheJobs

The Public Housing Fire Safety Act has the support of Firefighters (@IAFFNewsDesk) and Fire Chiefs (@IAFC) , the National Low Income Housing Coalition (@NLIHC), and public housing authorities across the country.

It's a bipartisan bill that would help cities across the country upgrade their older public housing stock with sprinkler systems.

That's why I joined @RepBonnie to introduce legislation creating a grant program to install fire sprinkler systems in public housing. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EzHqzhNWgAYWZs1.jpg

At least 2 million people live in public housing units without adequate sprinkler systems. Sprinklers save the lives of residents and first responders as well as protect homes and property.

That's why I've introduced the Public Housing Fire Safety Act.
